### Authored & Co-authored Publications

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

library(scholar)
library(tidyverse)


id <- 'Xes0-r0AAAAJ'
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
p <- get_publications(id)
pp <- p%>%
  select(year,journal,title,author,pubid)%>%
  filter(!journal=="")%>%
  arrange(desc(year)) %>%
  rename_with(~str_to_title(.x))%>%
  mutate(N = rev(row_number()),
         .before = everything()) 
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
knitr::kable(pp, 
             format = 'html', 
             caption = 'List of Publications 2020 to Present')
```
